head.eyes: Piercing blue-gray eyes that convey intense focus and determination, often shadowed by the cowl but visible during critical moments, reflecting both deep intelligence and suppressed trauma
head.nose: Strong, straight Roman nose with slight aristocratic definition, unbroken despite years of combat
head.ears: Concealed by the iconic cowl which features elongated, pointed bat-like ears that are both intimidating and functional for audio amplification
head.extra_facial_features: Square, defined jawline that appears clenched even at rest. Prominent cheekbones that create shadows across his face. Thin lips that rarely smile, set in a permanent grim line. A faint scar running through the left eyebrow from early vigilante days. Temple area shows premature graying at the edges when not in costume.

body.chest: Exceptionally broad and muscular chest developed through years of intense training, measuring approximately 52 inches. Defined pectoral muscles visible even through armor. The chest bears multiple scars including a distinctive claw mark pattern from early encounters. Upper torso shows V-taper physique optimized for both strength and mobility.
body.arms: Powerfully built arms with bulging biceps (20 inches) and triceps, covered in intricate scar tissue from countless battles. Forearms are densely muscled with visible vascularity. Wrist joints are remarkably flexible yet strong, allowing for complex martial arts maneuvers.

lower_body.legs: Athletic, powerful legs with quadriceps like steel cables. Thighs measure 28 inches in circumference, capable of explosive jumping and kicking power. Calves are equally developed, allowing for silent movement and sudden acceleration. Knees are protected by multiple old injuries that have healed stronger.

armor_costume.head: Advanced multi-layered cowl made of reinforced titanium-dipped tri-weave fibers. Contains: night vision lenses with 8x zoom, infrared filter, sonar mapping system, radio communicator, rebreather apparatus, and concussion-dampening gel lining. Ears function as both antennas and audio enhancers.

armor_costume.torso: Iconic black and gray Batsuit comprised of: bulletproof kevlar-nomex composite plating, electrified mesh underlayer for shock defense, temperature regulation system, magnetic grapnel anchors, and the signature bat symbol on chest made of conductive gold-titanium alloy that doubles as a throwing weapon storage unit.

armor_costume.arms: Gauntlets with overlapping armor plates containing: retractable razor-sharp batarangs, micro-explosive pellets, taser nodes, forensic scanner, laser cutter, and grapple line launchers. Elbow joints reinforced with carbon fiber knobs for striking.

armor_costume.legs: Armored leggings with shock-absorbing gel padding in knees and thighs. Boots feature: retractable titanium spikes, magnetic soles for wall-crawling, silent rubber treads, hidden blade compartments, and kinetic energy return system that enhances jumping ability by 300%.

armor_costume.utility_belt: Modular belt containing 36 compartments with: smoke pellets, cryptographic sequencer, medical kit, lock picks, tracking devices, freeze grenades, bat-shaped shurikens, and various antidotes to common Gotham toxins.

abilities.name: Master Detective
abilities.short_description: Genius-level intellect with unparalleled deductive reasoning skills
abilities.full_description: Possesses IQ of 192 with eidetic memory. Has mastered 127 forms of martial arts. Expert in criminology, forensic science, chemistry, biology, engineering, and computer science. Can process multiple streams of information simultaneously and predict enemy movements with 94.7% accuracy. Fluent in 39 languages including several extinct ones.

abilities.name: Shadow Movement
abilities.short_description: Ability to move completely silently and disappear in shadows
abilities.full_description: Through years of training with League of Shadows, can control breathing, heart rate, and body temperature to become virtually undetectable. Masters the art of using darkness as both camouflage and psychological weapon. Can remain motionless for hours and blend into any environment. Footsteps register at less than 10 decibels.

abilities.name: Fear Projection
abilities.short_description: Psychological warfare techniques that induce terror in opponents
abilities.full_description: Uses theatricality, timing, and environmental manipulation to create overwhelming fear responses. Voice modulator drops to 85 Hz frequency that triggers primal fear. Strategic positioning makes him appear larger and more menacing. Uses smoke, sudden movements, and psychological profiling to exploit specific phobias of each opponent.

abilities.name: Grapnel Launch
abilities.short_description: Precision grappling hook for rapid vertical mobility
abilities.full_description: Titanium claw fired at 150 mph with 500-pound test monofilament line. Magnetic and mechanical attachment systems allow for secure anchoring on any surface. Winch mechanism can lift 800 pounds at 30 feet per second. Includes zipline configuration and swing assist for traversing Gotham's rooftops.

head.eyes: Vibrant blue eyes that sparkle with mischievous energy, framed by dark eyebrows that often arch in amusement or concentration. Eyes show both the wisdom of experience and youthful enthusiasm
head.nose: Straight, athletic nose with a slight upward tilt at the end, bearing a small scar on the bridge from circus training accident
head.ears: Unobstructed ears that are slightly pointed at the tops, constantly attuned to environmental sounds. Multiple piercings along the cartilage when not in costume
head.extra_facial_features: Strong jawline that's less severe than Batman's, often breaking into wide grins. High cheekbones that give a dramatic appearance under mask. Thick black hair styled in a modern cut with natural highlights from sun exposure. A small beauty mark below the left eye.

body.chest: Lean, acrobatic build with well-defined but not bulky muscles. Chest measures 46 inches with perfect pectoral symmetry. Shoulders are broad and flexible with exceptional rotator cuff development. Skin shows numerous scars including a distinctive burn pattern on the right shoulder
body.arms: Long, sinewy arms with exceptional tendon strength. Biceps are defined but streamlined (16 inches). Forearms show intricate muscle separation from years of trapeze work. Wrists are double-jointed allowing for unique grappling techniques

lower_body.legs: Exceptionally powerful legs optimized for leaping and flipping. Thighs are densely muscular (25 inches) with visible striations. Calves are perfectly proportioned for explosive takeoffs. Knees show remarkable flexibility with hyperextension capability of 15 degrees

armor_costume.head: Black domino mask with specialized lens system: enhanced peripheral vision (210 degrees), facial recognition software, and communication link to Titans network. Mask material is virtually indestructible polymer

armor_costume.torso: Iconic blue and black costume with bird-like emblem across chest. Made of lightweight micro-weave kevlar with titanium-durasteel alloy plates at vital points. Costume includes temperature regulation and moisture-wicking systems. Back features the signature 'wing' design that can deploy for gliding

armor_costume.arms: Fingerless gloves with knuckle reinforcement and electro-shock capability. Wrist-mounted computers on both arms with holographic displays. Contains retractable escrima sticks that extend to 28 inches

armor_costume.legs: Flexible armor plating that doesn't restrict acrobatic movement. Boots feature vibration-dampening soles for silent movement and magnetic grips for wall-running. Hidden compartments in calves contain various gadgets

armor_costume.utility: Compact belt with modular pouches containing: wing-dings (customized batarangs), smoke pellets, first aid kit, lock picks, and specialized acrobatic aids

abilities.name: Acrobatic Mastery
abilities.short_description: Peak human agility and gymnastic ability from circus upbringing
abilities.full_description: Can perform quadruple somersaults, corkscrew twists, and precision landings from heights up to 100 feet. Balance is perfect even on surfaces less than 1 inch wide. Spatial awareness allows for mid-air course correction. Flexibility exceeds Olympic gymnast standards by 40%

abilities.name: Escrima Combat
abilities.short_description: Expertise in Filipino martial arts with electrified sticks
abilities.full_description: Master of 27 stick-fighting disciplines. Can engage up to 8 opponents simultaneously. Strikes are precise enough to disarm without causing permanent injury. Incorporates acrobatic movements for unpredictable attack angles. Sticks can deliver 50,000-volt shocks on contact

head.eyes: Piercing emerald green eyes that seem to change color in different light, always alert and calculating. Eyes are almond-shaped with naturally long lashes that require no enhancement
head.nose: Delicate but strong nose with a slight upturn at the tip, giving a mischievous appearance. Bridge is straight and narrow
head.ears: Small, close-set ears that are usually hidden by hair or cowl. Extremely sensitive to high-frequency sounds, capable of hearing cat-like ranges
head.extra_facial_features: Heart-shaped face with high cheekbones that create dramatic shadows. Full lips that naturally curve into a smirk. Jet black hair that falls in perfect waves, often with white streaks from stress. Skin is pale with flawless complexion except for a small scar through the left eyebrow

body.chest: Slim yet athletic build with feminine curves. Bust measures 36C with muscle definition visible in upper chest. Shoulders are narrow but powerful with excellent range of motion. Midriff is toned with visible abdominal definition
body.arms: Long, elegant arms with defined but not bulky muscles. Biceps are sleek (13 inches) with excellent definition. Forearms show tendon strength from climbing. Hands are slender with fingers that are both strong and dexterous

lower_body.legs: Exceptionally long legs with perfect proportion to torso. Thighs are strong and shapely (22 inches) with excellent muscle separation. Calves are defined but feminine. Ankles are slender yet strong enough for high-impact landings

armor_costume.head: Domino mask with night vision and thermal imaging. Ears of cowl contain audio enhancers and communication equipment. Goggles can deploy for underwater or smoky environments

armor_costume.torso: Signature black leather catsuit made of ballistic weave with titanium fiber threading. Zipper front with magnetic seal. Suit is form-fitting but allows complete freedom of movement. Includes retractable claws at fingertips

armor_costume.arms: Elbow-length gloves with reinforced knuckles. Wrist-mounted computers and retractable climbing claws. Contains micro-holographic projectors for creating distractions

armor_costume.legs: Thigh-high boots with 3-inch heels that are actually combat-effective. Soles contain micro-suction cups for wall climbing. Boot blades hidden in sides. Knee pads with shock absorption

armor_costume.utility: Whip made of carbon nanotube fibers with electrical charge capability. Utility belt with lock picks, jewelers tools, smoke pellets, and cat treats

abilities.name: Burglary Expertise
abilities.short_description: World-class thief with uncanny ability to bypass any security
abilities.full_description: Can crack 128-bit encryption safes in under 3 minutes. Master of lock picking, laser grid avoidance, and pressure plate detection. Knowledge of security systems from ancient to futuristic. Can case a location and identify vulnerabilities within 15 seconds of observation

abilities.name: Feline Agility
abilities.short_description: Superhuman flexibility and balance inspired by cats
abilities.full_description: Can bend backwards to touch heels to head. Balance allows walking on ropes only 0.5 cm thick. Landing falls up to 60 feet without injury. Silent movement even on broken glass. Can squeeze through openings only 8 inches wide

head.eyes: Vibrant cerulean blue eyes that seem to contain entire galaxies within them, radiating warmth and compassion. Eyes can glow red when heat vision is activated. Pupils have microscopic Kryptonian crystalline structures
head.nose: Strong, classic nose with straight bridge and gentle flaring at nostrils. Perfectly symmetrical with no visible imperfections. Can detect scents from up to 10 miles away
head.ears: Perfectly proportioned ears that are sensitive to sounds across entire frequency spectrum. Can hear whispers from across cities and detect heartbeats through walls
head.extra_facial_features: Square jawline that appears carved from marble, conveying both strength and gentleness. High cheekbones that catch light dramatically. Thick, dark hair with a distinctive curl that falls perfectly even in hurricane winds. Skin appears to glow faintly with solar energy absorption

body.chest: Broad, powerful chest measuring 58 inches with the iconic 'S' shield emblem. Muscles appear sculpted from living steel, with pectorals that seem to be solid plates. Skin is invulnerable but maintains perfect human texture and temperature. Chest can expand to contain super-breath capacity
body.arms: Massive arms with biceps measuring 24 inches yet perfectly proportioned. Every muscle fiber is super-dense, capable of lifting mountains. Forearms show vascular patterns that glow faintly when power is exerted. Skin shows no scars but faint phantom impressions of Kryptonian text

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs that appear as columns of living stone. Thighs measure 32 inches with muscle density 100 times human normal. Calves are perfectly defined, capable of leaps into orbit. Knees are invulnerable joints that allow for flight at light speed

armor_costume.head: No helmet typically, but can generate force field around head when needed. Hair is invulnerable to damage. Can manifest Kryptonian battle helmet from interdimensional space when required

armor_costume.torso: Iconic blue suit with red trunk and yellow belt. Material is made of indestructible Kryptonian bio-fabric that grows from his skin cells. 'S' shield is made of compressed dwarf star material that stores solar energy. Cape is woven from photons and solar radiation, flowing even in vacuum

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets typically, but can generate energy constructs around arms for space travel. Sleeves are made of same indestructible material that adjusts to temperature and environment automatically

armor_costume.legs: Red boots made of same Kryptonian material. Soles can generate anti-gravity fields for precise flight control. Boots automatically clean and maintain themselves through solar absorption

armor_costume.accessories: Fortress of Solitude key embedded in belt buckle. Can recall any item from fortress through quantum entanglement. Cape clasp contains universe translator matrix

abilities.name: Solar Empowerment
abilities.short_description: Absorbs and processes solar radiation for superhuman abilities
abilities.full_description: Yellow sun radiation charges every cell like biological batteries. Can store up to 10 years of solar energy. Efficiency of conversion is 99.9997%. Cells can process multiple radiation types simultaneously. Healing factor works by redirecting solar energy to damaged areas at cellular level

abilities.name: Heat Vision
abilities.short_description: Precise ocular energy projection reaching temperatures of solar core
abilities.full_description: Can project concentrated beams from 500°F to 12,000°F. Beam width adjustable from microscopic to 10 feet wide. Range extends to horizon line. Can use for welding at molecular level or destructive blasts. Eyes change to red glow when activated. Can split beams to hit multiple targets

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.short_description: Telekinetic manipulation of personal gravity field
abilities.full_description: Can achieve speeds up to 10x light speed in space. Atmospheric flight Mach 1000 with perfect maneuverability. Creates personal inertial dampening field that protects carried objects. Flight is controlled by conscious and subconscious thought. Can hover perfectly still for days

head.eyes: Deep brown eyes that shift to stormy gray when angry, containing ancient wisdom beyond her apparent years. Eyes reflect light like polished obsidian, with faint golden flecks that glow when using divine powers
head.nose: Classical Greek nose with straight bridge and delicate nostrils. Perfectly sculpted as if by Phidias himself. Nose can detect lies by scent changes in human physiology
head.ears: Delicate ears usually adorned with Amazonian jewelry. Can hear prayers directed to Greek gods across continents. Earrings are made of Olympian metals that enhance hearing
head.extra_facial_features: Face of classical beauty with high cheekbones and full lips. Skin has golden Mediterranean glow with perfect complexion. Dark hair falls in waves, often styled in intricate braids. Tiara sits perfectly on brow, made of Amazonium metal. Expression balances compassion with warrior intensity

body.chest: Powerful yet feminine build with athletic shoulders and defined musculature. Bust measures 38D with armor emphasizing rather than concealing form. Abdominal muscles show perfect eight-pack definition. Skin is invulnerable but maintains soft human texture. Back shows extensive muscle development from centuries of training
body.arms: Arms of a warrior goddess with defined biceps (15 inches) that show centuries of combat training. Forearms are strong with visible tendons. Wrists bear the magical Bracelets of Submission that can deflect any projectile

lower_body.legs: Legs of a champion runner with powerful thighs (24 inches) and perfectly defined calves. Muscles show both speed and strength development. Knees are protected by ceremonial greaves. Ankles are slender yet strong enough to support jumping from skyscrapers

armor_costume.head: Royal tiara made of Amazonium that can be thrown as returning weapon. Serves as crown, weapon, and communication device to Themyscira. Contains starlight crystal that glows when danger approaches

armor_costume.torso: Classic red and gold breastplate with eagle symbol, made of Olympian metals blessed by Hephaestus. Armor adjusts to any form while maintaining protection. Under-layer is flexible blue material that moves like silk but protects like steel

armor_costume.arms: Bracelets of Submission made from Zeus's Aegis shield fragments. Can deflect bullets, energy blasts, and even magic. When crossed, create force field capable of withstanding nuclear blast. Contain hidden blades that extend when needed

armor_costume.legs: Battle skirt made of overlapping armored plates that allow complete freedom of movement. Greaves protect shins and knees while allowing acrobatic movement. Sandals are reinforced for combat but appear as elegant footwear

armor_costume.weapons: Lasso of Truth made from Golden Girdle of Gaea, compels truth and burns with divine fire. God Killer sword that can cut through any material. Shield made from Athena's Aegis replica

abilities.name: Divine Strength
abilities.short_description: Strength gifted by Greek gods, rivaling Kryptonian power
abilities.full_description: Can lift over 100,000 tons. Strength scales with need - greater when defending others. Has held up collapsing skyscrapers and pulled satellites from orbit. Muscle fibers contain divine energy that multiplies force exponentially. Never tires due to divine endurance

abilities.name: Combat Mastery
abilities.short_description: Centuries of Amazonian and godly combat training
abilities.full_description: Master of 137 martial arts styles including some lost to time. Weapons expertise with 289 different weapons. Strategic mind that can predict battlefield movements hours in advance. Trained by Ares himself in war strategy. Can fight multiple opponents while blindfolded

head.eyes: Intelligent brown eyes that constantly analyze surroundings, with subtle crow's feet from stress and age. Eyes contain microscopic HUD implants when not in suit. Pupils dilate 40% faster than normal when assessing threats
head.nose: Straight, aristocratic nose with a slight bump from boxing injuries in MIT days. Can detect chemical compositions through nanite-enhanced olfactory sensors
head.ears: Normal human ears augmented with subdural audio processors. Can filter specific frequencies and enhance others. Contains emergency communicator implant in left ear
head.extra_facial_features: Strong jawline usually covered in perfectly trimmed goatee. High cheekbones that create dramatic shadows. Hair is dark with distinguished gray at temples, always perfectly styled. Skin shows faint arc reactor glow through shirt. Expression constantly shifts between arrogance and intense focus

body.chest: Athletic build with well-defined but not bulky muscles. Chest houses arc reactor that glows blue through clothing. Pectoral muscles show definition (44-inch chest) but primary strength comes from armor. Skin shows numerous scars including large circular one from reactor surgery
body.arms: Strong arms with defined biceps (16 inches) from years of armor piloting. Forearms show engineer's strength with visible tendons. Hands are surprisingly elegant with long fingers capable of micro-soldering

lower_body.legs: Runner's legs with strong thighs (24 inches) from carrying armor weight. Calves are well-defined. Knees show signs of old sports injuries. Overall physique optimized for balance in armor rather than raw strength

armor_costume.head: Gold-titanium alloy helmet with full sensory suite: 360-degree vision, targeting systems, communications, life support, and JARVIS/F.R.I.D.A.Y. AI interface. Faceplate retracts for facial expressions

armor_costume.torso: Modular armor plates with arc reactor power source. Repulsor technology in chest and palms. Uni-beam projector in center chest. Nanotech storage units that can deploy additional armor layers. Temperature regulation from -200°F to 3000°F

armor_costume.arms: Gauntlets with repulsors, micro-missiles, lasers, and energy blades. Wrist-mounted holographic interfaces. Magnetic field generators for manipulating metal objects. Retractable tools for engineering work

armor_costume.legs: Boot jets for flight and stabilization. Thrusters capable of Mach 8 flight. Reinforced legs for high-impact landings. Additional weapon systems in knees and calves. Magnetic boots for wall-walking

armor_costume.systems: Friday AI assistant, satellite network access, global surveillance capabilities, nanotechnology repair systems, teleportation module, and dimensional scanning equipment

abilities.name: Genius Intellect
abilities.short_description: One of Earth's smartest humans with mastery of multiple scientific fields
abilities.full_description: IQ of 270 with photographic memory. Has created revolutionary technology in energy, computing, and engineering. Can design complex machinery in his head. Understands and improves alien technology. Has built AIs that pass Turing test. Business acumen combined with scientific genius

abilities.name: Repulsor Technology
abilities.short_description: Particle beam weaponry and propulsion system based on arc reactor
abilities.full_description: Palm and chest beams can be adjusted from non-lethal stun to building-cutting intensity. Can focus to microscopic precision for surgery or spread for area effect. Thrust enables flight at escape velocity. Can create force fields and construct hard light objects. Energy efficiency is 98.7%

head.eyes: Clear blue eyes that convey unwavering determination and old-soul wisdom. Eyes show no signs of aging despite chronological age over 100. Pupils react to light 30% faster than normal human
head.nose: Straight, strong nose that was once broken multiple times but healed perfectly. Can detect subtle scents up to 1 mile away due to enhanced senses
head.ears: Perfectly proportioned ears that can hear whispers from 100 yards. Can detect heartbeat irregularities in others. No hearing damage despite years of combat
head.extra_facial_features: Square jawline that appears carved from granite. Clean-shaven with perfect skin that shows no wrinkles or age spots. Blond hair styled in classic military cut with slight wave. Prominent cheekbones that create heroic silhouette. Expression usually serious but can break into warm, reassuring smile

body.chest: Perfect human physique with 56-inch chest that appears sculpted by Michelangelo. Muscles are at absolute peak human potential with no body fat. Skin shows few scars due to healing factor. Sternum bears faint impression where serum was injected. Posture is always perfectly erect
body.arms: Powerful arms with biceps measuring 22 inches of pure muscle. Forearms show intricate vascular patterns. Hands are large and strong but capable of delicate operations. No tremors even after hours of holding shield

lower_body.legs: Legs of Olympic-level athlete with thighs measuring 30 inches. Quadriceps show perfect separation. Calves are powerfully defined. Every muscle group works at 100% efficiency with no energy waste. Can run at 30 mph for hours without tiring

armor_costume.head: Classic cowl with 'A' emblem and wing designs. Made of reinforced kevlar with communication equipment. No eye protection as enhanced vision doesn't require it. Can be worn under helmet when needed

armor_costume.torso: Scale mail costume made of vibranium-weave fabric. Star emblem is solid vibranium. Costume is flexible but protects against bullets and energy weapons. Includes temperature regulation for arctic to desert environments

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets typically, but can add armored gloves when needed. Wrist-mounted shield return system. Utility straps on arms for additional equipment

armor_costume.legs: Reinforced boots with shock-absorbing soles. Can run silently despite size. Boots provide perfect traction on any surface. Leg armor is minimal to allow maximum mobility

armor_costume.shield: Vibranium-steel alloy shield that is virtually indestructible. Perfectly balanced for throwing and ricocheting. Can absorb kinetic energy and redirect it. Edge is sharp enough to cut through tanks. Painted in iconic red, white, and blue pattern

abilities.name: Peak Human Condition
abilities.short_description: Absolute maximum of human potential in every physical and mental attribute
abilities.full_description: Strength allows lifting 1200 pounds. Can run at 30 mph for marathon distances. Reflexes are 5 times faster than Olympic athletes. Healing factor prevents disease and slows aging. Mental processing allows simultaneous tactical analysis of entire battlefields. Never fatigues due to perfect lactic acid processing

abilities.name: Master Tactician
abilities.short_description: Brilliant military strategist who can outthink any opponent
abilities.full_description: Can process battle information and predict outcomes with 96% accuracy. Has memorized every major battle in history and applies lessons instantly. Can command multiple squads simultaneously while fighting. Creates contingency plans for any scenario. Understands enemy psychology and exploits weaknesses

head.eyes: Electric blue eyes that crackle with lightning when channeling power. Eyes contain entire storm systems within them, shifting color with mood from sky blue to storm gray. Can see across electromagnetic spectrum including gamma rays
head.nose: Strong Nordic nose with slight arch, unbroken despite millennia of combat. Can detect ozone from approaching storms up to 100 miles away
head.ears: Slightly pointed ears indicating royal Asgardian heritage. Can hear thunder from other continents. Jewelry includes silver ear cuffs during ceremonial occasions
head.extra_facial_features: Face of ancient warrior-king with strong jawline usually covered in blond beard. High cheekbones that look carved from mountain stone. Long golden hair that moves as if in perpetual breeze. Skin glows with internal power. Expression usually boisterous but can become terrifying when angry

body.chest: Godly physique with chest measuring 60 inches of divine muscle. Skin is invulnerable to most weapons. Tattoos of Asgardian runes glow when using magic. Chest hair is gold like his head hair. Muscles contain the power of storms within them
body.arms: Arms that have held up world trees and fought celestial beings. Biceps measure 26 inches with veins that glow when channeling lightning. Forearms show scars from millennia of battles. Hands can grip with mountain-crushing force

lower_body.legs: Legs of a god who has walked between worlds. Thighs measure 34 inches with muscle density beyond measurement. Calves are like pillars of marble. Every step creates thunderous impact. Can leap between continents

armor_costume.head: No helmet typically worn, but can summon Asgardian battle helmet when needed. Hair is magically protected. Eyes can emit blinding light. Beard is often braided with silver threads

armor_costume.torso: Asgardian battle armor made of Uru-metal plates over leather. Circular emblem with Odin's symbol. Cape made of woven dimensional fabric that flows without wind. Armor is self-repairing and grows stronger with each battle

armor_costume.arms: Silver vambraces that enhance striking power. Gauntlets that can channel lightning through punches. Armor plates connected by magical energy rather than physical joints

armor_costume.legs: Armored greaves that allow movement at godly speeds. Boots made of same material as Bifrost. Leg armor decorated with scenes of Asgardian victories

armor_costume.weapon: Mjolnir/Uru hammer worthiness-enchanted. Stormbreaker/axe capable of Bifrost travel. Both weapons channel lightning and can return when thrown

abilities.name: God of Thunder
abilities.short_description: Control over weather and lightning as literal deity of storms
abilities.full_description: Can summon hurricanes, tornadoes, and lightning storms. Controls temperature from absolute zero to star surface heat. Lightning strikes with precision targeting. Can create localized weather systems. Power scales with need - stronger when defending others. Draws power from Asgard itself

abilities.name: Allspeak
abilities.short_description: Universal translation ability allowing communication with all beings
abilities.full_description: Can speak and understand any language including animal, machine, and cosmic entities. Magic allows meaning translation rather than word-for-word. Can communicate with non-verbal beings through empathy. Understands ancient and future languages. Can break codes instantly by understanding intent

characters.name: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Hokage of Konoha
Jinchuriki of Kurama
Hero of the Fourth Great Ninja War

head.eyes: Bright blue eyes that shift to fox-like slits when accessing Kurama's chakra, radiating determination and boundless energy. Eyes contain the wisdom of both youthful innocence and hard-won experience, often sparkling with mischief or narrowing in fierce concentration
head.nose: Small, slightly upturned nose with faint freckles across bridge. Can sniff out clones and transformations due to enhanced sensory abilities from sage training
head.ears: Normal human ears that are surprisingly attuned to negative emotions due to childhood experiences. Earlobes slightly elongated from occasionally wearing heavy headbands
head.extra_facial_features: Three distinctive whisker-like marks on each cheek from Kurama's chakra. Spiky blond hair that defies gravity, with longer bangs framing his face. Wide, infectious grin that shows slightly pointed canines. Tanned skin from constant outdoor training. Forehead protector with Konoha symbol worn proudly

body.chest: Lean, athletic build developed through years of intense ninja training. Chest shows defined musculature (42 inches) without bulk, optimized for speed and agility. Scar from Sasuke's Chidori visible on left pectoral. Skin shows numerous training scars that tell stories of battles won
body.arms: Well-defined arms with wiry strength. Biceps (15 inches) show perfect balance between power and flexibility. Forearms crisscrossed with scars from rasengan training. Hands are calloused but surprisingly dexterous for complex hand signs

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for incredible speed and jumping ability. Thighs (22 inches) show explosive power development. Calves are perfectly toned from tree-walking practice. Can leap between trees and buildings with effortless grace

armor_costume.head: Konoha forehead protector with distinctive scratch across symbol. Orange goggles in early years replaced by headband. Can summon toad sage headdress when entering sage mode. Hair remains unhelmeted for maximum mobility

armor_costume.torso: Signature orange jumpsuit with blue accents, made of durable shinobi fabric. Black shirt underneath for layering. Flame pattern orange jacket as Hokage. Chest protector can be worn over or under depending on mission

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets, allowing free movement for hand signs. Wrist and forearm guards for kunai storage. Fingerless gloves that allow chakra flow while protecting palms

armor_costume.legs: Blue shinobi pants with multiple pockets for tools. Leg warmers for additional protection. Special reinforced sandals that allow chakra adhesion for water and tree walking

armor_costume.accessories: Large scroll for summoning jutsu. Multiple kunai and shuriken holsters. Medical pouch with soldier pills. Rasengan training glove for practice

abilities.name: Rasengan
abilities.short_description: Spiraling sphere of compressed chakra that rotates at cellular level
abilities.full_description: Created by Fourth Hokage, perfected by Naruto. Chakra rotation at 1000+ RPM creates devastating drilling force. Can be thrown (Rasenshuriken), made giant (Mega Rasengan), or combined with elemental nature. Mastery allows one-handed formation. Ultimate form can destroy at molecular level

abilities.name: Shadow Clone Jutsu
abilities.short_description: Mass production of physical clones with shared consciousness
abilities.full_description: Forbidden technique mastered due to immense chakra reserves. Can create thousands of clones simultaneously. Each clone has equal power to original. Experiences transfer back when dispersed. Allows for massive multitasking and training acceleration. Tactical applications include reconnaissance, combat overwhelm, and substitution

head.eyes: Dark, determined eyes that shine with unbreakable will. Eyes become more intense when using Conqueror's Haki, seeming to pierce through opponents' souls. Always sparkling with adventure and curiosity about the world
head.nose: Normal human nose that's surprisingly good at smelling meat from great distances. Can detect specific ingredients in dishes. Slightly rounded tip that gives boyish appearance
head.ears: Normal ears that listen intently to friends' dreams and enemies' weaknesses. Can hear the 'voice of all things' including ancient poneglyphs. Usually hidden under straw hat
head.extra_facial_features: Prominent scar under left eye from self-inflicted childhood demonstration of courage. Wide, rubbery grin that stretches impossibly wide when laughing. Black hair that's short and messy. Cheeks retain youthful roundness despite harsh experiences. Straw hat constantly present except in most intense battles

body.chest: Lean, rubbery torso that can stretch and compress amazingly. Chest bears large X-shaped scar from Akainu's magma fist. Muscles are deceptively strong despite slim appearance (38-inch chest). Skin has rubber texture that bounces back from impacts. Can inflate like balloon using Gear 3 techniques
body.arms: Long, stretchable arms that can extend for miles. Biceps can expand to gigantic proportions. Shoulders are incredibly flexible. Hands are usually clenched in fists ready for Gum-Gum Pistol attacks. Wrists bear friendship tattoos from Impel Down

lower_body.legs: Rubbery legs that can stretch like elastic. Thighs can expand for Gear 3 attacks. Calves are strong enough to kick through steel. Feet are usually barefoot or in simple sandals. Can spin legs like propellers for unique movement techniques

armor_costume.head: Straw hat given by Shanks, his most precious treasure. Hat is surprisingly durable, surviving countless battles. Symbol of promise to become Pirate King. Worn always except in most serious fights

armor_costume.torso: Red vest worn open over bare chest. Sometimes adds longer red coat when in colder climates or formal situations. No armor as rubber body provides natural defense. Scar proudly displayed as badge of survival

armor_costume.arms: No arm protection. Wrist tattoos from Impel Down alliance. Arms free for maximum stretching capability. Sometimes wears armbands in different arcs

armor_costume.legs: Blue shorts or pants depending on arc. No leg armor. Simple sandals or going barefoot. Clothing designed not to restrict rubber body movements

armor_costume.accessories: Yellow sash tied around waist. Sometimes adds backpack for food storage. No weapons as his body is his weapon. Den Den Mushi for communication when needed

abilities.name: Gum-Gum Fruit Powers
abilities.short_description: Rubber body with incredible stretching, bouncing, and impact resistance
abilities.full_description: Body has properties of rubber: immune to blunt attacks, electricity, and bullets. Can stretch any body part up to 72 times original length. Elasticity allows for incredible speed when snapping back. Impact resistance scales with willpower. Can inflate bones and muscles for power boosts. Awakening allows environment to become rubber

abilities.name: Haki Mastery
abilities.short_description: Three types of spiritual energy: Observation, Armament, and Conqueror's
abilities.full_description: Observation Haki: Sense presence, emotions, and predict movements. Advanced form sees several seconds into future. Armament Haki: Hardens body like iron, can hit logia users. Advanced form emits internal destruction. Conqueror's Haki: Knocks out weak-willed, can coat attacks for supreme power. Only one in millions has this ability

head.eyes: Warm, compassionate maroon eyes that shift to sharp focus during combat. Eyes contain the kindness of his family and determination of his mission. Pupils can become slitted when tapping into demonic memories or intense concentration
head.nose: Exceptionally sensitive nose that can detect emotions, demons, and minute environmental changes. Can smell sadness, lies, and even history of locations. Slightly rounded tip that gives gentle appearance
head.ears: Normal ears adorned with distinctive hanafuda earrings passed through generations. Can hear heartbeats and subtle movements. Earrings jingle softly during movement, becoming a recognizable sound to allies
head.extra_facial_features: Gentle face with kind features that belie his warrior spirit. Prominent scar on forehead that changes form when using Sun Breathing techniques. Black hair with red tips that glow during intense battles. Hair usually tied in ponytail. Expression usually kind but becomes fiercely protective when fighting demons

body.chest: Lean, athletic build developed through brutal training. Chest (40 inches) shows definition without bulk, optimized for breathing techniques. Scar from initial demon attack visible on shoulder. Skin bears numerous training scars from Urokodaki's harsh methods. Breathing causes visible steam during techniques
body.arms: Strong arms with defined muscles from constant sword practice. Biceps (14 inches) show perfect sword-swinging development. Forearms are crisscrossed with scars from battles. Hands are calloused but gentle when caring for Nezuko. Grip strength exceptional for sword control

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for the Total Concentration Constant. Thighs (21 inches) show explosive power for Water Breathing techniques. Calves are perfectly toned from mountain running. Can maintain incredible speed and agility for extended periods

armor_costume.head: No helmet, allowing maximum sensory perception. Checkered haori hood can be pulled up in rain or snow. Hanafuda earrings constantly worn. Hair tied back to keep vision clear

armor_costume.torso: Standard Demon Slayer Corps uniform: black gakuran jacket with bronze buttons. Green and black checkered haori over top, pattern matching his sister's kimono. Uniform reinforced with special fibers that resist demon claws

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets, allowing free movement for sword techniques. Uniform sleeves allow complete range of motion. Hands protected by fingerless gloves when needed

armor_costume.legs: Black hakama pants with reinforced knees. Leg wrappings for additional protection. Special tabi boots with split-toe design for better grip and stealth movement

armor_costume.equipment: Nichirin sword that changes color to black with red edge. Wooden box for carrying Nezuko during daytime. Medical supplies and demon-slaying tools. Wisteria poison for emergency use

abilities.name: Water Breathing
abilities.short_description: Sword techniques that mimic the flow and power of water
abilities.full_description: First breathing style learned, with 10 forms focusing on fluid movement and precise strikes. Creates visual effects of flowing water during attacks. Techniques range from defensive (Water Wheel) to offensive (Striking Tide). Forms can be modified and combined. Mastery allows cutting through anything with water-like persistence

abilities.name: Sun Breathing
abilities.short_description: Original breathing style from which all others derive, mimicking the sun
abilities.full_description: Most powerful breathing style with 13 forms. Creates solar flame visual effects. Can actually burn demons like sunlight. Passed down through family dance. Each form corresponds to different solar phenomena. When mastered, sword glows bright red and leaves burning trails. Can be combined with Water Breathing for unique techniques

head.eyes: Large, expressive pink eyes that change from gentle to fierce. Pupils become slitted when in combat mode. Eyes convey childlike innocence despite demon nature. Can communicate emotions through eye movements alone
head.nose: Normal human nose that retains some sensitivity. Often wrinkled when smelling danger. Bamboo muzzle covers lower face, secured by red cord
head.ears: Normal ears partially hidden by long black hair. Can hear subtle sounds even in sleep. Hair ornaments (now gone) replaced by natural hair color gradient
head.extra_facial_features: Pale demon skin that glows in moonlight. Black hair fading to orange-red at tips. Hair grows when using powers. Small fangs visible when mouth opens. Bamboo muzzle prevents biting. Childlike face that belies growing power

body.chest: Petite frame that shrinks to child size to conserve energy. Chest (32 inches) shows no definition due to child form. Demon markings appear on skin when using powers. Skin is pale but warm to touch for allies
body.arms: Slender arms with hidden strength. Biceps (9 inches) can expand with demon power. Hands have sharp black nails that can extend into claws. Wears simple kimono sleeves

lower_body.legs: Short legs in child form, normal length when grown. Thighs (16 inches) contain explosive power for kicking. Can regenerate limbs instantly. Often barefoot or wearing simple sandals

armor_costume.head: Bambose muzzle secured with red cord. No other headwear. Hair worn loose or in simple style. Former hair ornament replaced by natural color

armor_costume.torso: Pink kimono with black patterns, originally her mother's. Red obi sash. Simple undergarments. Kimono sleeves allow free movement

armor_costume.arms: No armor or protection. Kimono sleeves cover arms. Hands usually kept at sides unless fighting

armor_costume.legs: Kimono skirt allows kicking freedom. No leg armor. Often barefoot or wearing simple footwear when provided

armor_costume.equipment: Wooden box for daytime travel. No weapons besides natural demon abilities. Sometimes carries small pouch given by brother

abilities.name: Blood Demon Art: Exploding Blood
abilities.short_description: Manipulates own blood to create explosive or protective effects
abilities.full_description: Primary Blood Demon Art. Can ignite blood to create explosions or form protective barriers. Pink flames are harmless to humans but destructive to demons. Can create concentrated bursts or wide-area explosions. Grows more powerful with emotional triggers

abilities.name: Size Manipulation
abilities.short_description: Can shrink to child size or grow to adult form

abilities.name: Daytime Resistance
abilities.short_description: Can survive sunlight exposure without disintegrating
abilities.full_description: Unique among demons. Can walk in sunlight without burning. Possibly due to human willpower or unique transformation. Sunlight still weakens but doesn't destroy. Requires more energy when in sunlight

head.nose: Normal nose, very sensitive to demon scents. Wrinkles when crying or scared. Can sniff out danger before seeing it
head.ears: Exceptional hearing that detects heartbeats, emotions, and minute movements. Ears twitch when detecting lies or danger. Normal appearance but function supernaturally
head.extra_facial_features: Boyish face with permanent anxious expression. Peach-colored hair with yellow gradient at tips. Hair spikes when using Thunder Breathing. Often has tear stains on cheeks. Mouth either trembling or determined line

body.chest: Slender build that hides explosive power. Chest (38 inches) expands dramatically when using breathing techniques. Wears standard uniform under yellow haori. Skin bears light scars from training
body.arms: Deceptively strong arms from constant sword practice. Biceps (13 inches) contain lightning-fast reflexes. Hands tremble when scared but steady in sleep. Calloused from gripping sword

lower_body.legs: Legs built for incredible speed. Thighs (20 inches) contain power for Thunder Breathing First Form. Calves perfectly developed for instant acceleration. Can move faster than eye can follow

armor_costume.head: No helmet. Hair often messy from running. Sometimes wears simple headband. Ears always exposed for maximum hearing

armor_costume.torso: Standard Demon Slayer uniform. Distinctive yellow haori with white triangle pattern. Haori represents lightning. Uniform often disheveled from panic

armor_costume.arms: No gauntlets. Uniform sleeves rolled up sometimes. Wears fingerless gloves for better grip

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants. Leg wrappings for support. Special tabi boots reinforced for high-speed movement

armor_costume.equipment: Nichirin sword that turns yellow with lightning patterns. Standard demon-slaying kit. Extra thunderclap bombs. Always carries debt collection notices

abilities.name: Thunder Breathing: First Form - Thunderclap and Flash
abilities.short_description: Extremely fast forward dash and slash
abilities.full_description: Mastered single form of Thunder Breathing. Moves at lightning speed leaving golden trail. Can be used in sixfold or eightfold variations for multiple strikes. Speed increases when unconscious. Creates actual thunderclap sound. Cuts before demon can react

abilities.name: Enhanced Hearing
abilities.short_description: Supernatural hearing ability
abilities.full_description: Can hear heartbeats, emotions, muscle movements, and even spiritual presence. Detects lies and intentions. Can pinpoint weaknesses in enemy stance. Hearing so acute it causes pain in loud environments

abilities.name: Sleep Fighting

head.eyes: Sharp, fierce emerald green eyes visible through boar mask. Pupils contract to predatory slits when excited. Eyes glow with fighting spirit. Can see in near-darkness from mountain living
head.nose: Exceptionally sensitive nose, nearly equal to Tanjiro's. Can track by scent alone. Often sniffs loudly when curious. Nose wrinkles when angry or confused
head.ears: Normal ears hidden by wild hair. Can hear subtle sounds from wilderness training. Ears perk up at challenge or food mention
head.extra_facial_features: Surprisingly beautiful feminine face that contrasts wild personality. Pale skin with delicate features. Blue-black hair worn wild and untamed. Often wears boar head mask. Mouth either in fierce grin or pout

lower_body.legs: Powerful legs built for leaping and climbing. Thighs (24 inches) like tree trunks. Calves perfectly developed for mountain terrain. Can run on all fours at incredible speed

armor_costume.head: Boar head mask made from actual boar head. Worn constantly except when eating or sleeping. Mask has fierce expression. His own face rarely seen by others

armor_costume.legs: Standard hakama pants but often torn or modified. Leg wrappings for climbing. Barefoot or simple foot coverings

armor_costume.equipment: Two notched Nichirin swords with serrated edges. Crude self-made sheaths. Often carries foraged food. Minimal demon-slaying supplies

abilities.name: Beast Breathing
abilities.short_description: Self-developed breathing style mimicking wild beasts

abilities.name: Spatial Awareness
abilities.short_description: Can sense space and objects without sight
abilities.full_description: Developed in pitch-dark mountains. Can sense surroundings through air currents, vibrations, and instinct. Can fight blindfolded. Detects invisible attacks. Spatial memory is perfect

abilities.name: Flexible Joints
abilities.short_description: Can contort body in unnatural ways
abilities.full_description: Joints can dislocate and reposition at will. Can squeeze through impossibly small spaces. Attacks come from unexpected angles. Makes defense against him nearly impossible

abilities.name: Poison Mastery

head.nose: Divine nose adorned with golden stud. Can smell cosmic decay and creation
head.ears: Elongated from millennia of meditation, pierced with divine earrings. Hear universal heartbeat
head.extra_facial_features: Blue throat from drinking poison. Matted hair containing Ganges River. Ash-covered skin from funeral grounds. Serene expression hiding universe-ending power. Four faces when showing true form

body.chest: Yogi's torso (52-inch chest) containing compressed cosmic cycles. Muscles move with dance rhythm. Chest bears sacred syllable 'ॐ' glowing with power. Skin covered in sacred ash
body.arms: Multiple arms when using true power (usually shows four). Each arm represents different aspect of destruction. Hands hold damaru, trishula, etc. Normal form shows two perfectly toned arms

lower_body.legs: Dancer's legs (30-inch thighs) that perform Tandava. Calves contain rhythm of cosmic dance. Feet that crushed demon and created dance

armor_costume.head: Crescent moon in hair. Serpent as headband. Third eye usually closed. Crown of skulls when serious

armor_costume.torso: Tiger skin loincloth. Ash-covered body. Serpent across shoulders. No shirt for maximum dance movement

armor_costume.arms: Multiple gold bracelets. Arm bands with bells for dance rhythm. No gloves for direct touch

armor_costume.legs: Bare legs with ankle bells. Toe rings for cosmic connection. Knees scarred from eternal meditation

armor_costume.accessories: Trishula (trident). Damaru (drum). Cobra necklace. Skull garland. Ganges in hair

abilities.name: Tandava
abilities.short_description: Dance of destruction that unravels reality itself
abilities.full_description: Each dance move destroys aspect of existence. Feet stomps create black holes. Hand movements tear dimensional fabric. Final form 'Rudra Tandava' ends cosmic cycle. Can dance so fast creates afterimages that also fight

abilities.name: Deva Loka
abilities.short_description: Manifests personal universe where Shiva's dance rules all
abilities.full_description: Creates space where only destruction laws apply. Everything ages instantly to dust. Time flows according to dance rhythm. Ultimate technique 'Mahakala' erases even void
